About

Hello, my name is Hayley Uberti. I am a skilful and a wholehearted dance and yoga teacher with a background in performance. As a professional dancer with two decades of dance training and teaching, I already had a keen interest in how the body moved and ways to keep fit and healthy but unfortuntely with so much demand on the body, my dancing career came to a halt from injury eight years ago. Turning to yoga for my own healing, it not only benefited my physical body but also greatly supported my journey mentally and emotionally.

This discovery of yoga awakened a deep spark to learn more about the ancient practice, rich history and powerful tools which eventually led me to complete my Hatha Yoga teacher training in India where I was privileged to receive private tuition and mentoring from a wise, traditional and accomplished yoga master giving me the confidence and knowledge to eventually open my own bespoke studio in Bath, England and running Retreats around the world. I have been teaching passionately ever since and continue my skills development including a dedicated daily self-practice.
